Name: Translate To English
Description: Translate the given text message using Groq API
Prompt: Only Translate the given message to english do not give explanations or perform other task

Name: translation
Description: Translate the given voice record using Groq API

Name: draft an email
Description: Write an email with the given message do not do Other task
Prompt: Write a formal email for the given message.Do Not Do task other than writing email.

Name: Write an email
Description: Write an email with the given prompt in the recording using Groq LLama Api.

Name: correct Grammar
Description: Correct the grammar in the given text message using Groq Llama API
Prompt: Only Correct grammar for the given message, Do not do Other Tasks

Name: correct Grammar
Description: Correct the grammer in the given recording using Groq Llama and whisper API

Description: Write an essay for  the given text message using Groq Llama API
Prompt: Write an essay for  the given message. Do Not Deviate from the Topic Only write Essay

Name: Write an Essay
Description: Write an essay for  the given text message using Groq Llama and whisper API
